page.title: 07WEST FELTON SCHOOL BUS
page.content: Claire Mansfield,aged 9, was later filmed working at home.She said "I don't mind my Mum teaching me. The work is easier than at school". Following a Protest March along the A5 a meeting was held in the school attended by members of the Education Committee,local councillors,governors,the Headmaster and parents and the whole matter was discussed very thoroughly. Following County Council Election's on Thursday, May 2nd,the new Education Committee agreed to the bus being re-instated with the proviso that this could be a temporary measure pending a review of the Council's transport policy. The children returned to school on June 24th.
